attributes.action: Get our soldiers out of Afganistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a war that we cannot win.  The experts in these matters also agree that it cannot be won.  Get our soldiers out as soon as possible.  Do not under any circumstances send any more soldiers to Afganistan.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
